--- delete_as.sql
delete foo as F where F.foo = 1
--- AST
&ast.Delete{
  Delete:    0,
  TableName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 7,
    NameEnd: 10,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  As: &ast.AsAlias{
    As:    -1,
    Alias: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 14,
      NameEnd: 15,
      Name:    "F",
    },
  },
  Where: &ast.Where{
    Where: 16,
    Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &ast.Path{
        Idents: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 22,
            NameEnd: 23,
            Name:    "F",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 24,
            NameEnd: 27,
            Name:    "foo",
          },
        },
      },
      Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 30,
        ValueEnd: 31,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "1",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DELETE FROM foo AS F WHERE F.foo = 1
